description: This file defines a React functional component named SurgeryModal that provides a modal interface for creating or editing surgery schedules within a surgery scheduling system. It manages form state for surgery details such as title, type, room, doctor, nurses, times, notes, and includes handlers for save, delete, and toggle nurse assignment actions.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Handles saving the form data, invoking onSave callback with the current form state and selected doctor and nurses, after validation.

methods.name: handleNurseToggle
methods.description: Toggles assignment of nurses to the surgery by updating the nurseIds in the form state.

methods.name: SurgeryModal({ isOpen, onClose, rooms, resources, initial, onSave, onDelete, })

ctags.name: SurgeryModal
ctags.signature: ({ isOpen, onClose, rooms, resources, initial, onSave, onDelete, })
